div.p: N.S. is the leading author of this study. N.S. wrote the paper and carried out all the analysis; A.R.B. contributed on developing and updating the EwE model, gathering data, balancing and fitting the model to time-series; M.T.B. contributed on developing the analysis of temperature projections under the climate change scenarios and the analysis of historical temperature time-series; B.L.P. contributed on developing the statistical validation analysis and the graphic work using R studio. P.H. contributed on gathering data for the phytoplankton and zooplankton historical time series; P.G.F. contributed on developing and updating the EwE model also supplying scientific knowledge on the fishery ecology aspects of this study. J.J.H. contributed on developing and updating the EwE model, supplying scientific knowledge on the ecosystem modelling aspects of this study. J.J.H. is also a PI on the NERC grant that funded this study. All authors reviewed the manuscript.
